about_the_game:
After being dumped by my girlfriend due to poor sexual skills, a familiar-looking Japanese girl transfers into my department.

To my surprise, she turns out to be an active AV actress! Not only is she willing to teach me how to improve my skills, but she also encourages me to hook up with others to gain experience.

With things coming this far, there’s no turning back—I’m determined to master techniques that even an AV actress can't handle.

※Visual Novel Gameplay

As the story progresses, players will encounter multiple characters and engage in deep interactions, advancing the plot. The gameplay is linear, with no choices, allowing players to focus on experiencing the narrative.

※Intimate dynamic CGs

There are multiple CGs for all five characters in the game, and through dynamic performances throughout the entire process, every intense moment of physical interweaving with the female characters is more clearly shown.

※Growing up

Your will encounter various female characters over the course of a little more than a month.

Each day is divided into three time periods: Morning, Afternoon, and Evening.

During each period, players can choose one action from Work, Training, or Hookup, which is only available at night.

By planning different activities to improve your abilities, you can increase the female characters’ affection and gradually deepen your relationships with them through the main storyline and various events!

※Learning from Hookups

Hookup can only be conducted at night. You can take the other person to different dates to increase your favorability, and finally push them into bed to accumulate practical experience.

※Turning Money into Progress

In the shop, you can exchange the money you've earned for various items that help you improve faster or increase the affection of female characters.

Some items are essential for reaching a happy ending!

content_descriptors.notes:
The characters in this game are all over 20 years old.
It contains adult themes such as female nudity and pornographic content. Please pay attention before playing and make sure you play in a suitable place.

name: My Classmate is AV Actress

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: A new transfer student in my class turns out to be an japanese AV actress, and she’s even offering to teach me sexual techniques! By gaining experience through hookups, my ultimate goal is to win over the AV actress with my phenomenal skills.
